General.Name: Jiangxi Jovo Energy Co. Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Jovo Energy Co., Ltd operates as a clean energy integrated service provider for gas industries in China and internationally. The company invests in, procures, stores, distributes, and trades in liquefied petroleum gas and liquefied natural gas, as well as petrochemical products, such as methanol, dimethyl ether, etc. It also operates 20 natural gas vehicle fueling stations across China. In addition, the company is involved in provision of warehousing, logistics and distribution, technical guidance, gas gasification station, safety training, operations management, partner, energy procurement, and energy investment consulting services. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
